h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: Another move she can use at close range is to raise most of her body up on her back legs, and dance down upon you with her front talons to stab the ground multiple times in quick succession. Since it's hard to evade each blow individually, consider using the Thrust Stance to retreat and strike from a distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
Another move she can use at close range is to raise most of her body up on her back legs, and dance down upon you with her front talons to stab the ground multiple times in quick succession. Since it's hard to evade each blow individually, consider using the Thrust Stance to retreat and strike from a distance.
